content: description meet this adorable purple seal this amigurumi pattern is designed for comfort and cuteness featuring a round body and a sweet embroidered nose it s perfect for intermediate beginners who love working with soft chenille yarn size the finished seal is approximately 15cm 5 9 inches tall depending on your yarn gauge materials needed * yarn double-ply 2mm light chenille yarn light purple ~50g dark purple ~1g * hook 3 0mm * others 10mm plastic safety eyes fiberfill 33g stitch markers and a sewing needle pattern details * terminology us terms * construction the pattern is worked in rounds not spiral joining each round with a slip_stitch tutorial includes step-by-step photos for assembly and details copyright this pattern is for personal use only sharing reproduction or resale of this pattern is strictly prohibited you may sell finished products made from this pattern but please credit @crochetartd as the designer
